## `AppendDailyLog`

Toggles whether the current log file should be appended\index{log report!settings} when the program restarts.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
AppendDailyLog(bool append)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `bool` append | `true` to use append mode. |
